Implementation approach: We will use Flutter to develop the 2048 game, leveraging the built-in features and widgets for UI design and game logic implementation. We will also utilize open-source libraries for any additional functionalities needed.
Program call flow:
sequenceDiagram
    participant G as Game
    participant UI as UI
    G->>UI: startNewGame()
    UI->>G: move(direction)
    G->>G: isGameOver()
    G->>UI: showGameOverScreen()
